none: media/user/SCRAPE/test/2021-05-bad-year/extracted/Bad Year/01 I Can't Help This Coming Back Again Off The Floor

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on May 23, 2021 Description from Terminal Escape:
 Seven doses of Florida fury from the lost decade of aughts. I think some of these parties were later responsible for DEAD FRIENDS, but I might be wrong. I fucking love the way the drummer rides the bell before the breakdown in "Unleashed" though, and the other tape that Drugged Conscience did is a total ripper too. Can't think of a better way to ugly-up five minutes of your day. BAD YEAR

seo.title: Bad Year - s/t demo - Terminal Escape
